input.sentences: this boy wanted to be a super star
he practiced everyday on the drums
everyday he could play the drums faster and faster
his dad trained him how to play
his sister was jealous of him
output.sentences: Joey always had been a musical kid.
Joey found that drums were his favorite instrument and he practiced everyday.
Joey practiced drums so much, that he began to wonder about his sister.
Joey's brother came in and told Joey that his sister would love to play the drums too.
Joey let his sister sit behind the drum kit, and decided to start taking turns.
